section.heading: Cutting down or destroying things growing on or attached to the land of another.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 105(p) of the Omnibus Criminal Justice Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 1994 (D.C. Act 10-255, June 22, 1994, 41 DCR 4286).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 7(b) of the Sentencing Reform Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 13-462, October 25, 2000, 47 DCR 9443).
